description: Number of admission requests which were triggered as a part of Kyverno
The bucket aggregation shows the number of observations within each distribution bucket in the admissions review latency histogram
short_name: kyverno admission review duration seconds bucket

description: The count aggregation shows the number of observation in the admissions review latency histogram
short_name: kyverno admission review duration seconds count

description: The sum aggregation of the admissions review latency represents the total amount of seconds it has taken for individual admission reviews corresponding to incoming resource requests that trigger policies and rules
short_name: kyverno admission review duration seconds sum

description: Number of objects deleted by the cleanup controller
Number of errors encountered by the cleanup controller while trying to delete objects
Number of queries per second (QPS) from Kyverno
The total number of Kubernetes requests executed during application reconciliation

Number of times a controller dropped an elements. Dropping usually indicates an unrecoverable error. The controller retried item processing multiple times and after failing each time, dropped the item.
short_name: kyverno workqueue work duration seconds count

description: Number of reconciliations performed by various Kyverno controllers
Number of times a controller re-queues elements to be processed. Re-queuing usually indicates that an error occurred and that the controller enqueued the same item to retry processing it a bit later.
The number of observations in the GC duration summary in the Kyverno instance
short_name: kyverno go gc duration seconds count

description: The number of observations in the GC duration summary in the Kyverno instance per quantile
The sum of the pause duration of garbage collection cycles in the Kyverno instance
short_name: kyverno go gc duration seconds sum

description: The number of goroutines that currently exist in the Kyverno instance
Metric containing the Go version as a tag
The number of bytes allocated and still in use in the Kyverno instance
The monotonic count of bytes allocated and still in use in the Kyverno instance
The number of bytes used by the profiling bucket hash table in the Kyverno instance
The total number of frees in the Kyverno instance
The fraction of this program's available CPU time used by the GC since the program started in the Kyverno instance
The number of bytes used for garbage collection system metadata in the Kyverno instance
The number of heap bytes allocated and still in use in the Kyverno instance
The number of heap bytes waiting to be used in the Kyverno instance
The number of heap bytes that are in use in the Kyverno instance
The number of allocated objects in the Kyverno instance
The number of heap bytes released to the OS in the Kyverno instance
The number of heap bytes obtained from system in the Kyverno instance
The number of pointer lookups
The number of mallocs
The number of bytes in use by mcache structures in the Kyverno instance
The number of bytes used for mcache structures obtained from system in the Kyverno instance
The number of bytes in use by mspan structures in the Kyverno instance
The number of bytes used for mspan structures obtained from system in the Kyverno instance
The number of heap bytes when the next garbage collection takes place in the Kyverno instance
The number of bytes used for other system allocations in the Kyverno instance
The number of bytes in use by the stack allocator in the Kyverno instance
The number of bytes obtained from system for stack allocator in the Kyverno instance
The number of bytes obtained from system in the Kyverno instance
The number of OS threads created in the Kyverno instance
Number of HTTP requests which were triggered as a part of Kyverno
The bucket aggregation shows the number of observations within each distribution bucket in the HTTP requests latency histogram
short_name: kyverno http requests duration seconds bucket

description: The count aggregation shows the number of observations in the HTTP requests latency histogram
short_name: kyverno http requests duration seconds count

description: The sum aggregation of the HTTP requests represents the total amount of seconds spent on HTTP requests
short_name: kyverno http requests duration seconds sum

description: Metric used to track the history of all Kyverno policy-related changes such as policy creations, updates, and deletions
The bucket aggregation shows the number of observations within each distribution bucket in the policy rule execution latency histogram
short_name: kyverno policy execution duration seconds bucket

description: The count aggregation shows the number of observations in the policy rule execution latency histogram
short_name: kyverno policy execution duration seconds count

description: The sum aggregation of the policy rule execution represents the total amount of seconds spent on the the execution and processing of the individual rules whenever they evaluate incoming resource requests or execute background scans
short_name: kyverno policy execution duration seconds sum

description: Metric used to track the results associated with the rules executing as a part of incoming resource requests and even background scans. This metric can be further aggregated to track policy-level results as well
Number of policies and rules present in the cluster. Includes both active and inactive policies and rules.
The total user and system CPU time spent in seconds in the Kyverno instance
The maximum number of open file descriptors in the Kyverno instance
The number of open file descriptors in the Kyverno instance
The resident memory size in bytes in the Kyverno instance
The start time of the process since the Unix epoch in seconds in the Kyverno instance
The virtual memory size in bytes in the Kyverno instance
The maximum amount of virtual memory available in bytes in the Kyverno instance
Number of objects deleted by the cleanup TTL controller
Number of errors encountered by the cleanup TTL controller while trying to delete objects
